pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========Euphonic========Euphonic is a Python package that can efficiently calculate phononbandstructures, density of states and inelastic neutron scatteringintensities from force constants. The force constants can be readfrom various sources, including CASTEP ``.castep_bin`` files, or Phonopy``phonopy.yaml`` files. While Euphonic is primarily a library, multiplecommand-line tools are also provided for convenient plotting of the abovequantities.For more information, see the `docs <http://euphonic.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>`_.
